website_summaries.verdict: Timberland drops a slip-on sneaker model that suits modern casual street style through the Timberland Groveton Slip-On. Unlike most mid-top or high-top Timberland shoes with an outdoor-inspired, rugged look, this slip-on rendition of the Groveton silhouette radiates a casual and laidback vibe. Because of its stylish flair and wide colorway selection, the Groveton Slip-On men's sneakers manage to catch the attention of buyers who are looking for a pair that blends comfort and style. It is an eco-friendly shoe, too, as it is made with recycled materials and plastic bottles.
pros: The Timberland Groveton Slip-On sneakers present a myriad of colorways to buyers
This slip-on sneaker model from Timberland offers an affordable price point
As with most Timberland sneakers, the Groveton Slip-on is well-liked for its reliable comfort
Most buyers express satisfaction with this shoe’s overall performance
Beautiful and nice are some of the words used by buyers to describe this shoe
A few reviewers note that this Timberland shoe is lightweight
cons: The Timberland Groveton Slip-On is limited to men’s sizing in medium width
Some reviewers highlight that the arch support of this shoe is not much

customer_reviews.title: True to size, good color.  Heavier than most other loafers due to solid looking build
customer_reviews.text: Too a little bit of time to break in for a slip on loafer but being a Timberland, that was expected. I like the greenish-gray color. The sole was what needed breaking in and it got more pliable as it got worn. Now a comfy shoe after a day. Perfect sizing and Timbers are usually half a size bigger for me compared to the sneaker sizes (Adidas/Puma, etc). Expect these Timbers to last a while - the nylon/canvas part looks quite durable and yesm scuffs will show on the nubuck front.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fake shoes that arrive dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Fake shoes that arrive dirty. The shoes looked like a knockoff. When I returned the shoes the company refused to give me my money back. Do yourself a favour and avoid the drama.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my husband to wear to a garden party and they were perfect. True to size and very comfortable. He loves to dance and these were comfortable enough to wear for about 6 hours (the first time).
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Look great but too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with my first impression. They’re an odd shape - too narrow. I have quite wide feet but Timberlands always fit me really well. I hope they wear in well because right now it’s like my feet are in a vice. They look great - just very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He has wide feet and this fits him perfectly (but to each their own.) the delivery was very fast and arrived way earlier than expected. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kazvan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spring shoe
customer_reviews.text: These have been a perfect spring shoe. Slip on and off easy. Comfortable for all day wear. Good traction.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look. Still breaking them in so there still a little hard. Feel very light on the feet. The all black look is very nice and gos with alot of looks
customer_reviews.author: jcol

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and feel great, look nice and are cheaper than regular Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D Henderson

customer_reviews.title: size down on these
customer_reviews.text: im usually a 15, but this shoe in a 15 was too large
customer_reviews.author: bebopsamurai

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Tim's! It's hard not to be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kabyle_moh

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is nice overall but Rain falled today and the black ran over on the white sole
customer_reviews.author: Troy Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and genuine!
customer_reviews.text: Genuine materials used slightly heavy though, but overall it’s a great shoe even for off-road in the country side
customer_reviews.author: Francis Bakala

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality nice and comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my lovely husband. Looks nice and feels comfortable - like all Timberland shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Yul Or

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks like it should be much more expensive than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great went and ordered other colors
customer_reviews.text: They looked good it fit my boyfriend well and he go lots of comments
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Fergerson

customer_reviews.title: creases easy but good casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and very easy to walk in. Good to dress up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kim

customer_reviews.title: a tad on the large size...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Shoe..My only complaint is my pair ran a tad large. Not much , but yes a little large. I bought some gel insoles and it took care of the problem but very happy otherwise.....Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward slip-on shoe that is very comfortable. Leather and fabric are both sharp. I ordered a half-size smaller than my usual US size and it fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: dalto

product_meta.title: Timberland Men's Groveton Slip on Sneaker
product_meta.description: Amazon carries Timberland footwear for men, women, and kids: sandals, boots, casual oxfords, tall boots, hiking boots, waterproof boots, winter boots, and women's shoes and boots. Timberland makes rugged, durable, comfortable waterproof leather boots. Timberlands are premium and popular, bringing style, comfort, performance and eco-conscious elements to their leather waterproof shoes and boots. Timberland wheat six inch boot is waterproof, insulated, and a best seller.
feature_bullets: Upper made with premium leather from an LWG Silver-rated tannery and 100% recycled CORDURA Ecomade canvas
Our patented L7 lug design features multi-directional leading edges with beveled lug sidewalls
